title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-5.1 - Qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-5.1 - Qualifications

State Regulations
(a) The total
extent of one-call notification systems shall be such in numbers and locations
as to provide protection of underground facilities throughout all areas of the

State with no geographic overlap of areas served. (b) Every one-call notification system shall
be governed by a not-for-profit corporation in accordance with the minimum
requirements contained in the law and in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
